GK19gu05-06u:550: mandiratayā vandināv amū tena saha yathā-svam āvāsaṃ vindataḥ sma,
GK19gu05-06u:559: [1] atha śrī-govinda-kṛtam ahasi vrajendra-sadasi prātaḥ-kathā prathām āpa /
GK19gu05-06u:561_2: pratilavam api śravasi vṛttaṃ kurvatām upanandādīnāṃ sānandānām api vilambāśaṅkā-śaṅku-saṅkulānāṃ
GK19gu05-06u:562: harer mātā bhaktaṃ tad-avadhi na bhuṅkte tad-anugās
GK19gu05-06u:564: kim anyad vaktavyaṃ vrajam anugataṃ yat paśu-kulaṃ
GK19gu05-06u:565: vanasthaṃ yad vā tan-nikhilam iha śiryad vilapati // iti // GC_2,6.1 //
GK19gu05-06u:566_0: [3] atha kutaścin manaḥ-stha-saṃkocataḥ samprati prati-gamanād viramya bhāvi-līlā-sūcana-devarṣi-vacana-smaraṇāt
GK19gu05-06u:566_1: tad-eva ca niyamya sahamānatāṃ vahann api tad-evaṃ niśamya samyag-utsukatayā gamyam
GK19gu05-06u:566_2: eveti manaḥ punaḥ saṅgamya so'ayaṃ vraja-prāṇa-vrajaḥ svāgrajaṃ raho nirvyājaṃ vyājahāra,- æārya /
GK19gu05-06u:568: ahaṃ punar vrajam eva vrajāni' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:570: - bhrātar bhavantaṃ vinā mama sarvaṃ vināśam āyātīti na mayā kim api syāt /
GK19gu05-06u:573: [6] sa uvāca,- yadūnugrasenānugatān vidhāya drutam ubhābhyām evāvābhyāṃ gokulaṃ gantavyam /
GK19gu05-06u:574: tad idaṃ mayāpi bhavyaṃ nivedayaitavyam āsit,
GK19gu05-06u:575: diṣṭyā svayam eva diṣṭyā tad uṭṭaṅkitam /
GK19gu05-06u:576: [7] atha śrī-kṛṣṇas tena sākaṃ śrī-vasudeva-vinā-kṛta-yadu-kula-virājamāna-yadu-rāja-sahāyāṃ gatvā kṣaṇād avasaraṃ ca matvā tad idaṃ nivedana-mudrayā vedayāmāsa,
GK19gu05-06u:582: rāja-mahāśayāś ca nija-rājāsanam evāsanaṃ vidhāya yathā-pūrvaṃ bhavatāṃ parva vitanitatāraḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:585: kiṃ tu mama vṛndāvanam eva sukha-vṛndāya kalpate' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:586: [10] tad evam avadhāya mukhāvalokanaṃ vyatividhāya satsu sabhāsatsu vikadru-nāmā yadu-bṛddhaḥ samṛddha-kṣobham ācacakṣe,
GK19gu05-06u:587: - pūrvam asmākam ekaḥ kaṃsaka eva dhvaṃsaka āsīt /
GK19gu05-06u:588: tad-balād anye punar asmābhir na gaṇyeṣu kṛtāḥ,
GK19gu05-06u:589: bhavatā pramāpite tu tasmin pracura-pramāṇas tad-vidhā jātāḥ,
GK19gu05-06u:590: yato jarāsandhādayas tat-sambandhāhita-nirbandhāḥ koṭayaḥ prasārita-śastra-koṭayaḥ santi /
GK19gu05-06u:591: tasmād bhavan-mātrāśraya-praṇayanīya-prāṇa-trāṇa-yātrā yadavaḥ svayaṃ yathāvad avasthāpyantāṃ saṃsthāpyantāṃ vā /
GK19gu05-06u:592: [11] kiṃ ca æasyās tvām aṣṭamo garbhaḥ' [bhā 10.1.34] iti gīr-vāṇa-vāṇī-sandarbha-sākṣitayā bhavān asmākam eva satyam apatyam,
GK19gu05-06u:593: na tu go-paty-adhipānām ity asmat-pratyavasthāpanam eva bhavatā pratyham ācaraṇīyam /
GK19gu05-06u:594: teṣām apakāra-kārakaś ca kaścana samprati bhātīti yathā-bhavyaṃ syāt tathā vyavahartavyam iti kim adhikaṃ marma-vyañjanayā sādhūnāṃ śatrujitsu parama-dharmavitsu /
GK19gu05-06u:595_0: [12] atha tad etad anatikramyaṃ niśamya samyag vācaṃ saṃyamya durmanā iva tasmād
GK19gu05-06u:595_1: apagamya śrī-vasudeva-devakībhyāṃ dharmyaṃ harmyam āgamya śrī-rāmeṇa samam eva tāv anu nivedayāmāsa,
GK19gu05-06u:600: [15] atha tad-etad avadhārya tau tūṣñīkām evāpuṣñītām /
GK19gu05-06u:601: tau hi pūrvam ugrasena-mukuṭa-bandham anu tad-vacana-pravandham ākarṇya vaivarṇyam evāsannau staḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:602: yaḥ khalv avyabhicāritayā vaiśampāyanādibhir api hari-vaṃṣādiṣu pracārita evāsti;
GK19gu05-06u:605: jānāte sma ca tāv asya manovṛttaṃ yad vraja-gamane labdha-saṅgamane sarvam asau vismaratīti /
GK19gu05-06u:607: - ætataḥ parihṛtāv eva cira-labdha-śvāsa-rūpābhyāṃ yuvābhyām āvām' iti tatrākrūrasya jananyā ca vicārataḥ krūram idaṃ proktam,
GK19gu05-06u:609: tarhi vraja evāyam astīti gamanaṃ vāsya kathaṃ nirodha-viṣayīkriyate ?' iti /
GK19gu05-06u:610: [17] atha sarve tasyā mukhaṃ paśyantaś ciraṃ vimṛśya tasthuḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:611: [18] tad-evaṃ sati punar vivikta-mitābhyāṃ rāmājitābhyām akṣīṇam aṣaḍa-kṣīṇam idaṃ nirṇiktaṃ viviktam,
GK19gu05-06u:612: - tad idam āvābhyāṃ saralatayā param anayor guru-caraṇayor niveditam /
GK19gu05-06u:613: tat punar amūbhāṃ svāniṣṭaṃ vitarkya pratyādiṣṭaṃ gurvājñālaṃghananṃ tu na maṅgalāya kalpeta /
GK19gu05-06u:614: yad-ājñā-pālanāya parama-maryādaḥ sa khalu raghu-varyaḥ prājyaṃ rājyam api parityajya nava-bhāryayā saha rākṣasa-caryābhīṣaṇam api vanaṃ bāḍham avagāḍhaṃ cakāra /
GK19gu05-06u:615: tad-ājñā-laṃghanasya parāmṛśyate ca phalam- jarāsandhādayas tv asmat-sambandhena kṛtānusandhe vraje'py utpātaṃ pātayiṣyantīti prastutam astu tāvad aprastutam anyad anyad api,
GK19gu05-06u:616: tasmāc śrī-vrajeśa-caraṇa-samādhānam eva sāmprataṃ sāmpratam iti /
GK19gu05-06u:617: [19] tad-evaṃ mantraṃ vidhāya śrī-vrajeśituranasāṃ samūha sannidhāya tābhyāṃ tasya parisaraḥ samājagme /
GK19gu05-06u:618: samāgamya ca praṇamya samyagāsanam āsthitayos tayo rāma eva tasmin sadasi yad vṛttaṃ tat pravṛttaṃ cakre /
GK19gu05-06u:619: [20] tatra svayaṃ kṛṣṇas tu pitṛ-pitṛvyādīn api sa-vinayaṃ paśyan kiñcid vihasann iva tasya śeṣam āha sma,- hanta/
GK19gu05-06u:620: kādācitkīm ākāśa-vāṇīṃ pramāṇīkṛtya mayi nija-devakī-putratām api te sūcayanti,
GK19gu05-06u:621: tad-antargataṃ sva-mataṃ kāraṇaṃ tu nāvatārayanti iti /
GK19gu05-06u:622: [21] athaitāvat kathitavati madhukaṇṭhe snigdhakaṇṭhaś cintayati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:623: - vastutaḥ khalv ayam anugatācintya-śaktitayā śrī-devakyāṃ catur-bhuja-rūpena śrĪ-yośodāyāṃ tu dvi-bhuja-rūpena sphurati sma æphalena phala-kāraṇam anumīyate' iti nyāyena /
GK19gu05-06u:625: tadā tu śrī-yośodāyāṃ sphuritaṃ dvi-bhuja-rūpam eva catur-bhuja-rūpam antarbhūtaṃ vidhāya tatrāvirbhūveti pūrva-campūm anu (3.102)
GK19gu05-06u:627: tat tu na pūrvam ubhayatrāpi jñātam āsīt iti /
GK19gu05-06u:629: - kathaṃ te svayam api kāraṇam avatārayeyuḥ ?
GK19gu05-06u:630: avatārite tu tasmin vasudevenāpahṛtāpatyasya go-paty adipasya nyāyaḥ satyaḥ syād iti /
GK19gu05-06u:633: - tac-chrutvā tu vraja-nṛpatir bahir avihataṃ vihasya tad anyathā adhyavasyati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:634: æasyās tvām aṣṭamo garbho hantā yāṃ vahase'budha' [bhā 10.1.34] iti
GK19gu05-06u:636: ækiṃ mayā hatayā manda jātaḥ khalu tavānta-kṛt /
GK19gu05-06u:637: yatra kva vā pūrva-śatrur mā hiṃsīḥ kṛpanān bṛthā //'[bhā10.4.12]
GK19gu05-06u:639: avyalīkatā-paryavasita-bhāṣiṇānakadundhubhinā ca māṃ prati nirdvandvam ittham evoktam,
GK19gu05-06u:640: ædiṣṭyā bhrātaḥ pra-vayasa idānīm aprajasya te /
GK19gu05-06u:641: prajāīśāyā nivṛttasya prajā yat samapadyata //' [bhā 10.5.23] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:642: tasmān nūnaṃ æprāg ayaṃ vasudevasyakvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ' [bhā 10.8.14] iti māṃ prati vyañjita-tattva-vargasya gargasya khalv idaṃ prapañcanam evāntaḥ kāraṇam udañcati /
GK19gu05-06u:643: [24] bhavatu, pitroḥ punar idaṃ sukha-samvidam eva tanute,
GK19gu05-06u:644: yan nija-putraṃ prati dhanyāḥ putra-bhāvanām ācarantīti /
GK19gu05-06u:645: [25] viśeṣataś cānakadundhubhinā mama taj-janyā ca bhavaj-jananyā na dvaitam astīti tais tad bhadram evocyate / kiṃ tu,
GK19gu05-06u:646: yātra syād asurād bhītiḥ sā tatra viraha-jvarāt /
GK19gu05-06u:647: bhāvad vayaṃ bhavaty evety ākulaṃ suta manmanaḥ // GC_2,6.2 //
GK19gu05-06u:648: [26] bhavatu, tathāpy eṣām eva sāhāyyaṃ kāryam,
GK19gu05-06u:649: yataḥ sarvajñānāṃ matam avadhārya kāryam etad vicārya khalu mayā kaṃsa-badhāya tavāgamanaṃ na visraṃsitam /
GK19gu05-06u:650: śrūyate hi - pūrvaṃ muni-hitāya daśarathenābhnava-tanayasya rākṣasa-kṣayāya prasthāpanam;
GK19gu05-06u:651: yaḥ khalv anyadā tad vana-gamana-kṣaṇa eva kṣīṇa-prāṇatām avāpa iti kṣaṇaṃ rodanaṃ viṣṭabhya tam etaṃ bāhubhyām avaṣṭabhy ca tad etan mukham īkṣāmāsa /
GK19gu05-06u:652: [27] tataḥ sa caiṣa tam enaṃ sacamānaḥ sa-gadgadaṃ jagāda,- tāta /
GK19gu05-06u:653: duṣṭā naṣṭā eva bhaviṣyantīti na tatra sandihyatām /
GK19gu05-06u:654: tathaiva hi daiva-phalaṃ mama tāta-caraṇeṣu vargaśa eva gargaḥ prati-ñātavān asti /
GK19gu05-06u:655: kadācin mayi caikānte vanānte devarṣi-varya iti /
GK19gu05-06u:656: tathā mama ca vāsas tāta-mahāśayānām upāsanamaya eva sampatsyate,
GK19gu05-06u:660: ete tu suhṛda iti jñātibhiḥ suhṛdāṃ khalv etādṛśa eva bhedaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:661: suhṛtsu tad-dhitāya kadācid vāsaḥ sadā tu jñātiṣu tad-āloka-sukhāya bhavati iti /
GK19gu05-06u:662: [28] evam uktavati rāmānuje rāma-nāmāpi svaṃ tat-sadṛśam eva parāmṛśann āha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:663: - pitur yuvābhyāṃ snigdhābhyāṃ poṣitau jvālitau bhṛśam āvām iti kiṃ vaktavyam;
GK19gu05-06u:664: yataḥ pitror ātmano'py abhyadhikā prītir ātmajeṣu bhavati iti /
GK19gu05-06u:665: [29] atha kṛṣṇaś ca tad eva sthāpayan prāha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:667: asya ca śrī-man-mad-agrajasya bhavān eva dharmataḥ pitā; yataḥ-
GK19gu05-06u:668: sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣñītāṃ sva-putravat /
GK19gu05-06u:669: śiśūn bandhubhir utsṛṣṭān akalpaiḥ poṣa-rakṣaṇe // [bhā 10.45.22] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:671: kiṃ tu suhṛdām eṣāṃ sukham abhimukhaṃ vidhāya śrī-caraṇam āgamisyāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:675: tathā vidheyaṃ yathā bhavad-vyatirekād ekākitayā mātā mā tāpaṃ yāsīt /
GK19gu05-06u:679: - tataḥ sarvam api gokulam utsannatām āpannaṃ syāt /
GK19gu05-06u:681: - tarhi sarvam api vrajaṃ nikaṭaṃ ghaṭayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:683: - sampraty asmākaṃ bahulāḥ pratyahaṃ saṃkhyādhikaya-pratyataḥ suṣṭhu bahulā jātāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:685: gāvaś cāsmākaṃ kula-devya iti tā eva sevyatām arhanti /
GK19gu05-06u:687: māṃ vinā tu byartham iti samarthanīyam,
GK19gu05-06u:688: tarhi ca mat-prāṇā eva tā iti tā eva prāṇanīyāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:692: tatrāstām asmat-sāmīpyam asmad-asāmīpyataś ca bhavad-avasthānaṃ yady asmat-saṃbandhaṃ vinā labdha-sandhaṃ bhavet tarhy eva kṛcchraṃ narcchet /
GK19gu05-06u:693: gūḍha-puruṣa-dvāreṇa jñāte hy asmat-saṃbandhe jarāsandhādayas ta ete kaṃsa-van na bhayānubandhā iti chala-balam ekam ekaṃ na prasthāpayiṣyanti /
GK19gu05-06u:694: kiṃ tv akṣauhiṇībhir dravantaḥ sarvaṃ vrajam apy upadrāvayiṣyanti /
GK19gu05-06u:695: tasmād asmābhir yuṣmābhiś ca gopayitavya eva gandhaś ca vyati-saṃbandhasya;
GK19gu05-06u:696: ete ca mayā yādavā durgāntare davayitavyāḥ;
GK19gu05-06u:697: bhavantas tv asaṃkhyā na tathā kartuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:700: tasmāt teṣāṃ durga-vad-asmad-audāsīnyam eva bhavatāṃ rakṣāyāṃ prāvīṇyam arhati /
GK19gu05-06u:701: [38] kiṃ tu tāvad eva tad vidheyam,
GK19gu05-06u:702: yāvat sarva-vipakṣa-pakṣāpakṣayaṃ vidhāya svayam eva śrī-mad-vrajam āvrajāmaḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:703: āvrajite ca tasmin na punar anyatra vrajanam api syāt,
GK19gu05-06u:704: yato nirupadhi-sneha-vyagra-bhavad-agrima-sva-jana-varga-darśana-sukha-mātra phala-pātratayā nirupādhir asau puruṣārthaḥ kathaṃ bādhitaḥ syāt ?
GK19gu05-06u:705: tad-evaṃ vyasya yan nivedutaṃ tad tad evedaṃ samasya nivedayāmi,
GK19gu05-06u:706: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca sneha-duḥkhitān /
GK19gu05-06u:707: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham // [bhā 10.45.23] iti /
GK19gu05-06u:708: [39] tad-etat-paryantaṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ procya bhrātaram avalocya prāha sma,
GK19gu05-06u:709: - atra ætāta' iti nijāntaḥ-sthāpita-putratā-bhāvanāyā yogyam eva sambodhanam; æjñātīn' iti,
GK19gu05-06u:710: tatrāpi æsneha-duḥkhitān' iti snehasya niravadhikatvāt prati-kṣaṇaṃ didṛkṣuṣu tan-mukhyeṣu teṣv evāvasthānaṃ prati-kṣaṇam eva sva-vīkṣaṇa-dānaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GK19gu05-06u:711: ævayam' iti æasmado dvayoś ca' iti pāṇinīya-smaraṇād astu tāvan mama vārtā,
GK19gu05-06u:712: kiṃ tv āvāṃ dvāv apy eṣyāva iti vyañjitam /
GK19gu05-06u:713: ædraṣṭum' iti teṣām ivātmano'pi tad-darśana-mātra-puruṣārthatā samarthitā /
GK19gu05-06u:715: viboddhum arhati' [bhā 10.14.6] ity atra bodha-viṣayī-bhavitum iti-vad-darśana-viṣayī-bhavitum ity arthāntare'pi tad-vad eva siddhāntitam;
GK19gu05-06u:716: æsuhṛdām' iti yadūnām ajñātitvam upakāryatva-mātraṃ ca dhvani-pātraṃ kṛtam
GK19gu05-06u:717: / tatra ca æsukhaṃ vidhāya' iti ktvā-prayogeṇa sāvadhika-nirdeśāt tad-bhayādi-nāśanānataraṃ punas tad anapekṣatvam api lakṣitam iti /
GK19gu05-06u:721: - vraja-rājaś ca tadīya-vāco-yukti-racanam anabhirucitam api bāḍham ucitam iti matvā manasi sva-lalāṭaṃ hatvā vāṣpa-spṛṣṭam aspaṣṭam ācaṣṭa,
GK19gu05-06u:724: - tāṃ prati ca yatheṣṭa-praṇāma-pūrvakaṃ nijeṣṭa-dvārā mayedaṃ sandeṣṭavyam iti procya sva-hasta-lipibhis tat patraṃ virocya śrīdāma-hasta-vinyastaṃ kṛtavān /
GK19gu05-06u:725: [43] śrīdāmā ca śrī-vraja-rāja-śuśrūṣāyāṃ kṛtānusandhas tan-mukhabandham atīva tad-dīnan-manyatānubandham anusandhāya taṃ vihāya nivedyam eva sa-gadgadaṃ gadati sma,
GK19gu05-06u:726: - yathā samprati vayaṃ duṣṭa-janāt kaṣṭam āśaṃkya spaṣṭam eva nāyāsyāmaḥ;
GK19gu05-06u:727: kiṃ tu śrīmat-pitṛ-caraṇa-paricaraṇa-prabhāvān mamāṣaḍa-kṣīṇam akṣīṇam āgamanaṃ pratyaham api vidyata eva /
GK19gu05-06u:729: ādye'hni kṣīra-bhaktaṃ ghana-dadhi-valitā roṭikā tasya paścāt-
GK19gu05-06u:731: mātar mahyaṃ nikāyye mahati rasayate paryaveṣi tvayā yan
GK19gu05-06u:732: na svapnas tan na vā tat sphuraṇa-mayam iti smaryatāṃ kiṃ tu satyam // GC_2,6.3 //
GK19gu05-06u:734: yavann āśnāsi mātas tvam iti niśamaye hanta nāśnāni tāvad
GK19gu05-06u:735: yady aśnāmīva tarhy apy anubhavad asu me ye'savaḥ śoṣamīyuḥ /
GK19gu05-06u:736: goṣṭhaṃ gacchāni paśyāny api nija-jananīṃ tad-vidhām evam eva
GK19gu05-06u:737: hy udyat tejaḥ-prakāśād ripu-gaṇam acirād ut-sahiṣye vijetum // iti // GC_2,6.4 //
GK19gu05-06u:738: [44] atha tad-etan niśamya samyag- asrāvilaṃ sandeśa-haraś ca vyājahāra,
GK19gu05-06u:739: - satyaṃ śrī-vrajeśvarī-caraṇāś ca svapna-vad idaṃ sāmprata-bhavad-bhojanādikaṃ sa-rodanaṃ vadanti sma /
GK19gu05-06u:740: bhavad-duḥkham āśaṃkya svābhojanam api gopayanti sma iti /
GK19gu05-06u:741: [45] atha tad-etad avadhārya sāścaryatayā sthiteṣu teṣu vraja-mahīkṣīd-ārdra-vīkṣitam ācacakṣe,
GK19gu05-06u:742: - bhavataḥ prema-vaśyānāṃ vayasyānām eṣāṃ vartane kā vārtā ?
GK19gu05-06u:744: - śrīman-mātṛvad eva te cāmī mamepsita-sakhi-janā vīkṣyayā mām upalapsyante;
GK19gu05-06u:745: kiṃ tu mātur-vatsalatā-svabhāvatayā kadācid anyathā-prathā bhāsiṣyate,
